typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp (toTimestamp("01-01-1900")),
	modifiedBefore as timestamp (currentTimestamp())
}
source(output(
		PostalCode as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		City as string,
		Reseller as string,
		BusinessType as string,
		ResellerId as string,
		ResellerKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Reseller',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ResellerDeltaSource
source(output(
		ChannelTypeId as integer,
		ChannelTypeName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'ChannelType',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TargetChannelType
ResellerDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(ResellerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Reseller = last(Reseller),
		BusinessType = last(BusinessType),
		ResellerId = last(ResellerId)) ~> Deduplicated1ResellerDeltaSource
Deduplicated1ResellerDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Reseller,
		BusinessType,
		ResellerId,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Reseller
Reseller select(mapColumn(
		BusinessType
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectReseller
SelectReseller select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName = BusinessType
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PreSKSelectChannelType
PreSKSelectChannelType aggregate(groupBy(ChannelTypeName),
	Count = count(1)) ~> Deduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
Deduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
TargetChannelType aggregate(groupBy(ChannelTypeId),
	ChannelTypeName = last(ChannelTypeName)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetChannelType
Deduplicated1TargetChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName,
		ChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType
SelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType select(mapColumn(
		TarChannelTypeName = ChannelTypeName,
		TarChannelTypeId = ChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType
SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType, SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType join(ChannelTypeName === TarChannelTypeName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType filter(isNull(TarChannelTypeId)) ~> FilterInsertChannelType
FilterInsertChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> InsertChannelType
InsertChannelType keyGenerate(output(Sk_ChannelTypeId as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SkChannelType
SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType aggregate(Max_TarChannelTypeId = max(toInteger(TarChannelTypeId)) + 0) ~> AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType
AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType derive(Max_TarChannelTypeId = iif(isNull(Max_TarChannelTypeId),0,Max_TarChannelTypeId)) ~> MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType
SkChannelType, MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType join(true() === true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType
JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType derive(ChannelTypeId = Sk_ChannelTypeId + Max_TarChannelTypeId) ~> DerivedChannelType
DerivedChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName,
		ChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PostSkChannelType
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetChannelType filter(!isNull(TarChannelTypeId)) ~> FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName,
		ChannelTypeId = TarChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
PostSkChannelType, UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType union(byName: true)~> UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType select(mapColumn(
		TarChannelTypeName = ChannelTypeName,
		TarChannelTypeId = ChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
PreSKSelectChannelType, SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType join(ChannelTypeName === TarChannelTypeName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType
JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeName,
		ChannelTypeId = TarChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FinalChannelType
FinalChannelType aggregate(groupBy(ChannelTypeId),
	ChannelTypeName = last(ChannelTypeName)) ~> ChannelType
ChannelType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'ChannelType',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ChannelTypeSink

parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp (toTimestamp("01-01-1900")),
	modifiedBefore as timestamp (currentTimestamp())
}
source(output(
		PostalCode as string,
		CountryRegion as string,

		City as string,

	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Reseller',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ResellerDeltaSource
source(output(
		SalesAmount as decimal(18,2),
		TotalProductCost as decimal(18,2),
		ProductStandardCost as decimal(18,2),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as decimal(18,2),
		ExtendedAmount as decimal(18,2),

ResellerDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(ResellerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Reseller = last(Reseller),
		BusinessType = last(BusinessType),
		ResellerId = last(ResellerId)) ~> Deduplicated1ResellerDeltaSource
Deduplicated1ResellerDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Reseller,
		BusinessType,
		ResellerId,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Reseller
SalesSource aggregate(groupBy(ProductKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey,
		SalesOrderLineKey),
	SalesAmount = last(SalesAmount),
		TotalProductCost = last(TotalProductCost),
		ProductStandardCost = last(ProductStandardCost),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct = last(UnitPriceDiscountPct),
		ExtendedAmount = last(ExtendedAmount),
		UnitPrice = last(UnitPrice),
		OrderQuantity = last(OrderQuantity),
		SalesTerritoryKey = last(SalesTerritoryKey),
		ShipDateKey = last(ShipDateKey),
		DueDateKey = last(DueDateKey),
		OrderDateKey = last(OrderDateKey)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesSource
Deduplicated1SalesSource select(mapColumn(
		SalesAmount,
		TotalProductCost,
		ProductStandardCost,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPrice,
		OrderQuantity,
		SalesTerritoryKey,
		ShipDateKey,
		DueDateKey,
		OrderDateKey,
		ProductKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey,
		SalesOrderLineKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Sales
Reseller, Sales join(Reseller@ResellerKey === Sales@ResellerKey,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSales
SalesTerritorySource aggregate(groupBy(SalesTerritoryKey),
	Group = last(Group),
		Country = last(Country),
		Region = last(Region)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesTerritorySource
Deduplicated1SalesTerritorySource select(mapColumn(
		Group,
		Country,
		Region,
		SalesTerritoryKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SalesTerritory
JoinSales, SalesTerritory join(Sales@SalesTerritoryKey === SalesTerritory@SalesTerritoryKey,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesTerritory
JoinSalesTerritory select(mapColumn(
		BusinessTypeAlias = BusinessType,
		Reseller_ResellerKey_Generated = Reseller@ResellerKey,
		ResellerId,
		Reseller,
		SalesTerritory_SalesTerritoryKey_Generated = SalesTerritory@SalesTerritoryKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectJoinSalesTerritory
TargetChannelType aggregate(groupBy(ChannelTypeId),
	ChannelTypeName = last(ChannelTypeName)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetChannelType
Deduplicated1TargetChannelType select(mapColumn(
		ChannelTypeId,
		ChannelTypeNameAlias = ChannelTypeName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectChannelType
SelectJoinSalesTerritory, SelectChannelType join(BusinessTypeAlias === ChannelTypeNameAlias,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForChannelTypeId
JoinForChannelTypeId select(mapColumn(
		BusinessTypeAlias,
		Reseller_ResellerKey_Generated,
		ResellerId,
		Reseller,
		SalesTerritory_SalesTerritoryKey_Generated,
		ChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectForChannelTypeId
SelectForChannelTypeId select(mapColumn(
		ChannelId = Reseller_ResellerKey_Generated,
		ChannelKey = ResellerId,
		ChannelName = Reseller,
		TerritoryId = SalesTerritory_SalesTerritoryKey_Generated,
		ChannelTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Channel

SELECT   
cus.CustomerTypeId
,cus.CustomerId
,ord.[OrderId]
,ord.[OrderEnteredByEmployeeId]
,ord.[OrderReceivedTimestamp]
,ord.[OrderTotalAmount]

 FROM [RetailTemplateDB].[dbo].[Order] ord
 INNER JOIN [RetailTemplateDB].[dbo].[Customer] cus
 ON ord.CustomerId = cus.CustomerId
 ORDER BY cus.CustomerId, ord.[OrderReceivedTimestamp]

SELECT 'ChannelType' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[ChannelType]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Country' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]

UNION ALL

UNION ALL

UNION ALL

UNION ALL

UNION ALL

 UNION ALL

# Retail Recommendation Accelerator Quickstart: Model Training


This notebook uses data from a database modeled based on a Retail Database Template. It trains a LightGBM machine learning model for product recommendation. The tables and columns used in this Notebook are only a minimum set and the solution needs to be customized to your own needs, by adding additional columns and features.

import logging
logging.getLogger("py4j").setLevel(logging.ERROR)

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

from pyspark.version import __version__ as pyspark_version
import pyspark.sql.functions as F

import mmlspark
from mmlspark.train import ComputeModelStatistics
from mmlspark.lightgbm import LightGBMClassifier
from pyspark.ml.feature import VectorAssembler

pd.set_option('display.max_columns', 50)

print(f"PySpark version: {pyspark_version}")
print(f"MMLSpark version: {mmlspark.core.__spark_package_version__}")

# #This solution uses selected tables from your Retail Database Template. 
# Make sure you update the names if you have used custom table names. You will also need to customize the columns to use and ideally add more columns. 
# This AI solution will use a minimum number of tables and columns to provide a baseline for further customization
TRANSACTION_LINE_TABLE = "RetailTemplateDB.TransactionLineItem"
RETAIL_PRODUCT_TABLE = "RetailTemplateDB.RetailProduct"
CUSTOMER_TABLE = "RetailTemplateDB.Customer"

# Data parameters
LABEL_COL = "Rating"
FEATURE_COL = "features"
RATIO = 0.8
SEED = 42

# Model parameters
OBJECTIVE = "binary"
BOOSTING = "gbdt"
NUM_LEAVES = 32
NUM_ITERATIONS = 100
LEARNING_RATE = 0.1
FEATURE_FRACTION = 0.8
EARLY_STOPPING_ROUND = 10
MODEL_NAME = "lgb-quickstart"
## Read the data from Spark table

def read_from_synms(storage_name, **kwargs):
    """Read a PySpark dataframe from SynMS
    
    Args: 
        storage_name (str): Name of the storage table

    Returns:
        spark.DataFrame: Dataset
    """
    query = "SELECT * FROM " + storage_name
    return spark.sql(query)

transaction_line_df = read_from_synms(TRANSACTION_LINE_TABLE)
print("Transaction Line Data Schema: ")
transaction_line_df.printSchema()

retail_product_df = read_from_synms(RETAIL_PRODUCT_TABLE)
print("Retail Product Data Schema: ")
retail_product_df.printSchema()

customer_df = read_from_synms(CUSTOMER_TABLE)
print("Customer Data Schema: ")
customer_df.printSchema()

# After reading each table into a dataframe in a previous step, we will now join the dataframes
raw_data = transaction_line_df.join(F.broadcast(retail_product_df), "ProductId").na.drop()
raw_data = raw_data.join(F.broadcast(customer_df), "CustomerId").na.drop()
raw_data = raw_data.drop("TransactionCompletedTimestamp", "TransactionLineItemId", "TransactionId")

print("Schema: ")
raw_data.printSchema()

df = raw_data.toPandas()
print("Shape: ", df.shape)

# calculate the correlation matrix
corr = df.corr()

# plot the correlation heatmap
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,10))         # Sample figsize in inches

sns.heatmap(corr, 
            xticklabels=corr.columns, 
            yticklabels=corr.columns, 
            cmap='RdBu', 
            vmin=-1, 
            vmax=1, 
            ax=ax, 
            annot=True,
            fmt='.2f', 
            annot_kws={'size': 10})
plt.show()
## Split the data into train, test

raw_train, raw_test = raw_data.randomSplit([RATIO, 1 - RATIO], seed=SEED)
print("Train: (rows, columns) = {}".format((raw_train.count(), len(raw_train.columns))))
print("Test: (rows, columns) = {}".format((raw_test.count(), len(raw_test.columns))))
Transform the original data feature columns into feature vectors

columns = raw_data.columns[3:] # change this to your corresponding column names
featurizer = VectorAssembler(inputCols=columns, outputCol=FEATURE_COL)
train = featurizer.transform(raw_train)[LABEL_COL, FEATURE_COL]
test = featurizer.transform(raw_test)[LABEL_COL, FEATURE_COL]

# Check if data is unbalanced
display(train.groupBy(LABEL_COL).count())

lgbm = LightGBMClassifier(
    labelCol=LABEL_COL,
    featuresCol=FEATURE_COL,
    objective=OBJECTIVE,
    isUnbalance=False,
    boostingType=BOOSTING,
    boostFromAverage=True,
    baggingSeed=SEED,
    numLeaves=NUM_LEAVES,
    numIterations=NUM_ITERATIONS,
    learningRate=LEARNING_RATE,
    featureFraction=FEATURE_FRACTION,
    earlyStoppingRound=EARLY_STOPPING_ROUND
)

feature_importances = model.getFeatureImportances()
fi = pd.Series(feature_importances,index = columns)
fi = fi.sort_values(ascending = True)
f_index = fi.index
f_values = fi.values
 
# print feature importances 
print ('f_index:',f_index)
print ('f_values:',f_values)

# plot
x_index = list(range(len(fi)))
x_index = [x/len(fi) for x in x_index]
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (10,10)
plt.barh(x_index,f_values,height = 0.028 ,align="center",color = 'tan',tick_label=f_index)
plt.xlabel('importances')
plt.ylabel('features')
plt.show()

## Save the model

Save the model to linked ADLS

# Retail Recommendation Accelerator Quickstart: Model Training


This notebook uses sample data to train a LightGBM model for retail product recommendation. The data is randomly generated.

import logging
logging.getLogger("py4j").setLevel(logging.ERROR)

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

from pyspark.version import __version__ as pyspark_version

import mmlspark
from mmlspark.train import ComputeModelStatistics
from mmlspark.lightgbm import LightGBMClassifier
from pyspark.ml.feature import VectorAssembler

pd.set_option('display.max_columns', 50)

print(f"PySpark version: {pyspark_version}")
print(f"MMLSpark version: {mmlspark.core.__spark_package_version__}")
Note: If you're using a Managed VNet enabled workspace, please download the dataset from the
[url](https://synapsemlpublic.blob.core.windows.net/files/PersonalizedData.csv) and then upload it to your own storage account in order to access it.

#Blob URI in linked RAW ADLSv2
storageaccount = "azrawdatalakego2d3"
filesystem = "raw"
filename= "PersonalizedData.csv"
uri = "abfss://" + filesystem + "@" + storageaccount + ".dfs.core.windows.net" + "/" + filename
print(uri)

# Read and display schema of file from RAW ADLSv2
raw_data = spark.read.csv(uri, header=True, inferSchema=True)
print("Schema: ")
raw_data.printSchema()

df = raw_data.toPandas()
print("Shape: ", df.shape)

# Data parameters
LABEL_COL = "Rating"
FEATURE_COL = "features"
RATIO = 0.8
SEED = 42

# Model parameters
OBJECTIVE = "binary"
BOOSTING = "gbdt"
NUM_LEAVES = 32
NUM_ITERATIONS = 100
LEARNING_RATE = 0.1
FEATURE_FRACTION = 0.8
EARLY_STOPPING_ROUND = 10
MODEL_NAME = "lgb-quickstart"

# calculate the correlation matrix
corr = df.corr()

# plot the correlation heatmap
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,10))         # Sample figsize in inches

sns.heatmap(corr, 
            xticklabels=corr.columns, 
            yticklabels=corr.columns, 
            cmap='RdBu', 
            vmin=-1, 
            vmax=1, 
            ax=ax, 
            annot=True,
            fmt='.2f', 
            annot_kws={'size': 10})
plt.show()
## Split the data into train, test

raw_train, raw_test = raw_data.randomSplit([RATIO, 1 - RATIO], seed=SEED)
print("Train: (rows, columns) = {}".format((raw_train.count(), len(raw_train.columns))))
print("Test: (rows, columns) = {}".format((raw_test.count(), len(raw_test.columns))))
Transform the original data feature columns into feature vectors

columns = raw_data.columns[3:]
featurizer = VectorAssembler(inputCols=columns, outputCol=FEATURE_COL)
train = featurizer.transform(raw_train)[LABEL_COL, FEATURE_COL]
test = featurizer.transform(raw_test)[LABEL_COL, FEATURE_COL]

# Check if data is unbalanced
display(train.groupBy(LABEL_COL).count())

lgbm = LightGBMClassifier(
    labelCol=LABEL_COL,
    featuresCol=FEATURE_COL,
    objective=OBJECTIVE,
    isUnbalance=False,
    boostingType=BOOSTING,
    boostFromAverage=True,
    baggingSeed=SEED,
    numLeaves=NUM_LEAVES,
    numIterations=NUM_ITERATIONS,
    learningRate=LEARNING_RATE,
    featureFraction=FEATURE_FRACTION,
    earlyStoppingRound=EARLY_STOPPING_ROUND
)

feature_importances = model.getFeatureImportances()
fi = pd.Series(feature_importances,index = columns)
fi = fi.sort_values(ascending = True)
f_index = fi.index
f_values = fi.values
 
# print feature importances 
print ('f_index:',f_index)
print ('f_values:',f_values)

# plot
x_index = list(range(len(fi)))
x_index = [x/len(fi) for x in x_index]
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (10,10)
plt.barh(x_index,f_values,height = 0.028 ,align="center",color = 'tan',tick_label=f_index)
plt.xlabel('importances')
plt.ylabel('features')
plt.show()
